section-title.text: Explore the Untamed Wilderness of Sri Lanka

text-box.welcome-text: Immerse yourself in the breathtaking landscapes and extraordinary biodiversity that define Sri Lanka. From the lush rainforests to the pristine beaches, our island nation is a sanctuary for a diverse array of wildlife.

information.text: Nestled in the heart of the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka unveils a spectacular showcase of biodiversity, making it a captivating destination for wildlife enthusiasts and nature lovers alike. boxes.title: Elephants in their Element
boxes.text: Witness the gentle giants of Sri Lanka—the Asian elephants—in their natural habitats. The country is home to one of the highest elephant densities in Asia. Experience the awe-inspiring sight of these majestic creatures

boxes.title: Big Cat Encounters
boxes.text: For the wildlife enthusiast seeking the elusive, Sri Lanka offers a chance to spot the majestic Sri Lankan big cats

boxes.title: Avian Extravaganza
boxes.text: Sri Lanka is a birdwatcher's paradise, with over 400 bird species recorded. From vibrant kingfishers to the rare Sri Lanka blue magpie, the island is a symphony of avian life. Don't forget your binoculars, as you explore the diverse bird sanctuaries and wetlands.
